Take butter in a pan and saute.
Add finely cut onines and saute till light brown.
Add all the capsicums and cook well.
Then add tomatoe puree to the onions.
Cook for some time and then add the tomato sauce.
Add all the boild vegetables and let it cook for some time.
Put salt, grated cheese and chaat masala.
Remove from flame.
Now put this colourful gravy on the fried bread circular slices and decorate it with tomatoes cut in "c" shape(mouth)
And spring onions cut in circles(eyes).
Crispy crunchy healthy and colourful smiles are ready to eat.

recipeDescription: All of us are very very familiar with different types of pizzas which is generally made from pizza baze with different kinds of toppings and lots of cheese,but here is something different type of pizza, topping of the same is made from sweet dates and nut,mouth is watering? So what you are waiting for, enjoy this pizza.
preparationMethod: Soak dates in milk for 2-3 hours, crush the same and microwave high for 30 seconds.Keep aside.
Heat ghee in non stick pan, add dates, mix well and sauté for a while.
Add milk powder, dry coconut powder, cardamom powder, walnut, almonds, mix well,cook stiring continously for 2-3 minutes or little thick,transfer this mixture to bowl and cool to room temperature.
88How to proceed
Arrange pizza base in a baking tray, spread 1 tbsp of prepared topping on every pizza base.
Sprinkle grated paneer, press lightly.
Bake in preheated oven at 200 degree celsius for 10 minutes.
Garnish with strawberry crush,cherry and almond slices.
Serve

recipeDescription: Tasty sweet serve with tea or coffee
preparationMethod: Combine the nuts, dates and chocolate in a bowl, mix well and refrigerate for half an hour.
Then fill it in samosa patti and shape them like samosas.
Heat the oil in a kadhai and deep fry the samosas till they turn golden brown and crisp from all the sides.
Drain on an absorbent paper and serve hot.

recipeDescription: Date cookies are a cookie recipe prepared from soaked dates. An amazing dessert or a delicious tea time snack, crispy and crunchy date cookies is a culinary delight and is sure to be appreciated by all.
preparationMethod: Keep seedless dates in a microwave for 1 minute.
Mix dates, almonds, cashew, marie buiscuits.
Make a roll and cover in a foil and keep in a refridgerator for 15 minutes.
After cooling cut the roll into pieces and serve.

recipeDescription: 1. you can even bake in the microwave instead of frying.
preparationMethod: Chop all the ingredients nicely in very small size.
Heat ghee in vessel add all ingredients.
fry till colur changes and dates are little tender and all ingredients are mixed well.
Take out ingredients on wooden plate and roll with rolling pin like roti.
Then aplly ghee on plams and make a thick roll from roti.
Keep it in freezer to set
Serve making slices of roll.

recipeDescription: Dates, Almond and Nutella Ladoos, are not only kids favourite, but everyone's favorite, as it has a chocolaty flavour and nutty texture which is quite satiating and tasty. A very quick, simple, healthy and tasty anytime snack. Kids will love to have some in their tiffins too.
preparationMethod: Grind the almonds to a powder in a mixer.
Mix the almond powder with chopped dates and nutella.
Use your fingers to combine all the ingridents.
Shape the the mixture into small balls and serve.

recipeDescription: Garlic chutney is a flavorsome blend of garlic or lehsun with spices and salt. A maharashtrian household favorite, lehsun ki chutney or garlic chutney is a great accompaniment to main course meals or snacks.
preparationMethod: Heat 2 tsp oil, add the garlic, red chillies and tomatoes and saute for 5 minutes.
Add the salt and blend in a mixer till smooth.
Heat the remaining oil in a pan and add this ground paste and saute till the mixture becomes thick.
Serve immediately or store refrigerated.

ingredients: sliced tomatoes, sliced olives, chopped capsicum
recipeDescription: You can use different toppings to make it taste your choice. serve hot.
preparationMethod: Place the 2 slices of toasted bread in a dish.
Spread the tomato ketchup.
Spread 1 teaspoon oil on each.
Place the toppings.
Scatter the grated cheese.
Place the dish in the oven for 10 mins .

recipeDescription: Serve with sweet chilli sauce and sour cream. use medium heat to prevent burning.
preparationMethod: Mix all together.
Let stand a couple of minutes.
Pour into lightly greased non stick fry pan.
Cook till golden brown
Turn over and brown other side

recipeDescription: Malai capcicum or capsicum makes for a tasty flavorsome vegetable dish in a rich creamy gravy. Malai capsicum or shimla mirch is a tempting quick capsicum recipe with capsicum, onion, tomatoes, cream (malai) ,indian spice powders and green coriander leaves.
preparationMethod: Heat the oil in a pan, add the onions and tomatoes and saute till they onions turns golden brown.
Add the capsicum and the remaining ingredients, mix well and cook till the capsicum is soft and tender.
Add the cream and mix well.
Serve hot.

recipeDescription: The all time favorite tomato soup is now made simple and quick to prepare with this easy tomato soup recipe. The thick, tangy and healthy tomato soup is best enjoyed with Toasted Croutons and a dash of coriander leaves. Bruschettas with Tomato and Basil or Garlic Bread, Baked Garlic Bread also goes well as an accompaniment to this ever popular Tomato Soup.
preparationMethod: Combine the tomatoes, onions, garlic and 3 cups of water in a pressure cooker, mix well and pressure cook for 3 whistles.
Allow the steam to escape before opening the lid.
Cool the mixture completely and blend in a mixer till smooth.
Transfer the mixture into a deep non-stick pan, add the butter, salt and pepper, mix well and cook on a medium flame for 3 to 4 minutes, while stirring occasionally.
Serve hot garnished with bread croutons and coriander.

recipeDescription: Bye the time the egg is being cooked u can fry the canapes & keep aside
preparationMethod: Finely chop the onions & tomatoes. saute the onions till pink.
Then add the tomatoes and green chillies & fry well.
Then beat the eggs seperately adding salt & add in the pan.then add salt & dry masalas & cover & let it cook for sometime.
Then fry the canapes & take this mixture & put it in the canapes.
Decorate with some grated cheese & chopped coriander leaves.

recipeDescription: The popular egg bhurjee is an easy way of cooking scrambled eggs with onion, tomato, ginger, chillies and garam masala. The tasty egg bhurji tastes awesome with rotis or naan.
preparationMethod: First beat eggs in a bowl.
Take pan heat oil.
Add onions till golden brown.
Add all masalas.
Then add eggs and lastly tomato and stir well till it seperate into small pieces.
Garnish with coriander and serve with bread or toasted bread.

recipeDescription: #1. remember not to crush the eggs but make small pieces of them.
preparationMethod: Boil the eggs completely, and cut them in very small pieces.
Make very small pieces of green chillies , cucumber , tomatoes.
Mix the eggs, green chillies,tomatoes,cucumber, chopped onion.
Add red chilli powder,black pepper powder to the mixture.
Now, take the slices and spread 1/2 tsp. of cream on one side of each slice
Fill in the mixture of eggs between the two slices.
Cook the sandwich in the toaster by spreading the butter on the other side of the slices , untill the sandwich becomes crispy.

ingredients: cloves (laung / lavang) powder black pepper (kalimirch) powder
recipeDescription: Delicious and spicy recipe made with boiled and grated eggs cooked with chillies, onions, tomatoes and an array of spices.
preparationMethod: Heat oil in a non stick pan add asafoetida(hing)& than add onion to it saute it till it is golden brown.
Add all masala and saute for few seconds.
Add chopped tomatoes and saute till softens.
At last add grated eggs to it and stir it for 5 minutes till oil is seperated,remove from fire.
Serve hot with bread.

recipeDescription: Egg kuruma is a spicy and tasty curry that can be served with chappati or with pulao.
preparationMethod: Add the water and eggs in pan and boil for 10-15 minutes.
Remove the shells and keep aside.
Heat the oil in a kadhai, add the ginger garlic paste, onions, salt and green chillies, mix well and saute till the onions turns golden brown in colour.
Add the coriander powder, garam masala, chilli powder and turmeric powder, mix well and saute for 2 minutes.
Add the tomatoes ,mix well and cook for 2 minutes on a medium flame.
Add the boiled eggs, 1/2 cup water, coconut milk and kaju paste, mix well and simmer for 10 minutes.
Serve hot garnished with curry leaves.

recipeDescription: Egg Pakoda it is a easy and quick pakodas. Children's will love it.
preparationMethod: Remove the shell of the boiled eggs. Firstly cut the egg into half, then cut each half of the egg into 4 stripes lengthwise. Remove the yellow of the egg.
Combine the besan, salt, chilli powder, baking powder and little water in a bowl and mix well to make smooth batter.
Heat the oil in a kadhai, dip each egg white strips in the batter and put in hot oil and deep-fry it till the pakodas turn brown in colour from all the sides.
Serve hot with tomato sauce.

recipeDescription: A Chinese vegetable noodles recipe, fast food veg noodles is easy to prepare and a nice way of sneaking vegetables with noodles . A favorite noodle recipe among kids, the fast food veg noodles taste superb as a snack, breakfast or can even be had as a packed lunch.
preparationMethod: Boil the noodles first...drain water and pour cool water on it and drain water again...
Keep aside
Now heat oil in kadaai and fry onions...then add coriander leaves n spring onions n fry
Now add sauces n saute well
Now add vegetables salt n pepper n fry well
Finally add boiled noodles n mix well
Serve hot

recipeDescription: A diabetic friendly salad recipe with methi seeds or fenugreek, Fenugreek salad is bitter in taste but high in nutritive values. Add a dash of lime juice and salt to the fenugreek salad and enjoy it as a side dish.
preparationMethod: Clean, wash and cut finely fenugreek leaves.
Wash and cut tomatos in small pieces.
Cut spring onions also in small pieces.
Finely chopp green chillies.
Mix them all together while serving add salt, oil & red chillie powder.

recipeDescription: Figs & Dates Burfi is a nutrient packed mouthwatering dessert recipe with figs or Anjeer cooked with dates and then served cut into small squares.
preparationMethod: Soak dried figs in two cups of water for three to four hours.
Drain and make a puree using a little water if required.
Alternatively, place dried figs in one cup of hot water for two to three minutes. drain and let cool. make a puree using a little water if required.
Chop seedless dates and place in half a cup of hot water for fifteen to twenty minutes.
Make a puree. alternatively, cook dates in a microwave oven on microwave high (100%) for thirty seconds and make a puree using a little water if required.
Chop almonds, cashewnuts and pistachios fine. grease a tray.
Heat ghee in a pan. add fig puree and dates puree. stir well and cook on medium heat, stirring continuously, for ten to fifteen minutes or till excess moisture dries up.
Add almonds, cashewnuts and pistachios. mix well and continue to cook for ten to fifteen minutes, stirring continuously.
The mixture will begin to leave the sides of the pan.
Spread evenly on the greased tray. cover with silver warq.
When cool, cut into pieces and serve.

ingredients: green chillies, cut into small pieces
recipeDescription: Always use low fat cheese as to cut down the calories serve it accompanied by a green salad
preparationMethod: Preheat the grill
Mix the chopped tomatoes capsicums and onion in a bowl.
Add the tomato ketchup mixed herbs and season with salt and pepper
Wet the pitta bread with a wet hand warm it in the grill on both sides
Take them out and cut the top end off the pitta bread
Fill the pitta bread with the mixture and also the green chillies if using them
Top the mixture in each pitta bread with 1 tablespoon of cheese and put them all under the grill till the cheese melts.
Serve hot with chilli sauce

recipeDescription: Flax Seed Powder, the warm, earthy and subtly nutty flavour of flax seeds combined with garlic and chilli powder make a very healthy and yummy seasoning to enhance everyday cuisines. This can be a part of your everyday healthy diet.
preparationMethod: Dry roast flax seeds on a pan for 3-4 minutes. Then add all ingredients in a bowl.
Blend all the ingredients in a mixer to a fine powder.
Use as required.

recipeDescription: French revoli is a spinach based baked recipe which can also be prepared on hot stove. The spinach puree is cooked with ginger garlic paste, chopped onions and topped with grated cheese just before baking. The French revoli simply melts in your mouth and is a healthy and tasty recipe.
preparationMethod: Boil spinach and grind in mixie.
Heat oil in a nonstick pan.
Add onion and cook till light brown.
Add ginger and garlic paste and red chilli pwd and cook for while.
Add grind spinach and cook for sometime.
Add little water to make some gravy.
Grate cheese on spinach.
Heat one tava properly put nonstick pan on that tava to bake.

recipeDescription: These leaves increases the digestion. It is very useful in Ayurvedic medicine. It relives cold and cough.
preparationMethod: Wash the leaves neatly and wipe them with tissue paper.
Make the bajji batter with besan, chilli powder,soda and salt. Add little water and mix well so that it forms a smooth thick batter.
Heat oil in a vessel and dip each leaf in the batter and gently slide in the oil and fry until golden brown.
Use a ladle to turn them so that it cooks on both sides.
Drain on tissue paper.
Serve with ketchup.

ingredients: green chillies, deseeded and finely chopped
recipeDescription: Fried cheese sandwiches is a tempting deep fried crsipy bread based snack dish. The bread slices are buttered and topped with cheese slices and tomato. These sandwiches are then dipped in a spicy egg mixture and deep fried. Serve them hot with tomato sauce.
preparationMethod: Make a batter by beating the eggs, milk, pepper and salt and keep aside.
Apply butter on the bread slices.
Use four slices of bread and place a cheese slice, followed by a tomato slice and sprinkle the green chilies on it.
Now place the remaining four slices of bread individually on the above.
Cut each sandwich into two triangular pieces.
Dip the sandwich pieces into the egg batter.
Heat some oil in a non-stick frying pan and lightly fry the sandwiches till golden brown.
Serve hot with tomato sauce.

recipeDescription: A step by step procedure for preparing fried wontons in typical South east asian style of cooking. A Chinese favorite snack or starter recipe, fried wontons are filled with meat or vegetable filling and served with soup.
preparationMethod: Make the dough with ingredients for the wraps using little water if necessary.
Keep in the fridge for ½ an hour.
Roll it cut into pieces.
Mix all the ingredients for the filling fill in the wraps make the shape.
Deep fry serve with hot garlic sauce or tomato ketchup.

recipeDescription: Garden tonic is a refreshing drink for the health conscious. Ideal after workouts and long tiring walks.
preparationMethod: Buch up the spinach and juice with the celery to set aside.
Juice the asparagus with tomato.
Combine the two mixture, stir and garnish with cherry tomato.

recipeDescription: Spruce up the nutrient content of your diet with this healthy and tempting palak paneer recipe. The spinach or palak puree is cooked with garlic and chillies and then mixed with paneer cubes. The palak paneer is best paired with rotis or naans
preparationMethod: Combine the ginger-garlic paste, green chilli paste and spinach with some water and pressure cook for about 7-8 minutes (just before the first whistle).
Remove, cool and blend in a mixer till smooth and keep aside.
Heat the oil in a kadhai and deep fry the paneer pieces till they turn slightly brown.
Drain on an absorbent paper and keep aside.
Heat 2 tbsp of butter in a pan, add the bay leaves and cumin seeds.
When the seeds crackle, add onions and saute till the onions become pink.
Add salt, black pepper, garam masala and mix well.
Add the paneer and spinach, mix well and cook for 1 minutes.
Transfer in a baking tray and bake for 30 minutes at 180 degree c.
Serve hot.

recipeDescription: Ghobi ke pakore is something which everyone would like to have in rainy season when served piping hot with chilli sauce and hot tea.
preparationMethod: Combine the besan, green chilli, lemon juice, salt, turmeric powder and red chilli powder in a bowl, mix well and add enough water to make a batter of pouring consistency.
Cover and keep aside for 5 to 7 minutes.
Heat the oil in a kadhai and dip each cauliflower floret in the batter and deep fry till they turn golden and crisp from all the sides.
Drain on an absorbent paper and serve hot.

recipeDescription: Golden is made differently by using poha chivda and sprouted moong. I am sure your kids would like to eat the same especially at their exam time. Why only kids youngsters and elders will also love to have the same, as this is something different but delicious too.
preparationMethod: Combine all the ingredients in a bowl and toss well.
Serve immediately and garnished with coriander.

If teekha pudina chutney is not readily available , combine 2-3 tsp green chilli paste (can add more green chilli paste if you want more teekha) and lemon juice with 1/4 cup of water and mix the same in poha chivda along with other ingredients.
If you like can add chopped onion also.

recipeDescription: Golden Coin, a nice snacks recipe enjoyed and loved by kids.
preparationMethod: Cut the bread slices in circle shape. Keep aside.
Combine all the remaining ingredients in a bowl and mix well.
Put 1 tbsp of the prepared mixture on top of one slice and cover it up with other slice
Heat a tava grease it with little oil and cook the bread from both the sides till it turns to golden brown in colour.
Serve hot with tomato sauce.

recipeDescription: Each time, before placing new set of sandwiches, clean-up the sandwich maker with a paper towel.
preparationMethod: Peel off the tomato.
Grate it finely.
Grate the chilies finely.
Heat vegetable oil in a non-stick frying pan.
Add grated chilies.
After 45 seconds, add grated tomato.
Fry for 2/3minutes.
Break the eggs.
Add to the tomato.
Add salt.
Make a good mixture of the eggs and tomato by stirring them constantly with spatula.
Remove from the oven.
Cut each slice of bread to get 2 triangular pieces.
Apply some vegetable oil on both side(up and down) of the sandwitch maker.
Set it to get hot.
Melt the cheese in microwave, heating it for 10 seconds or less.
Meanwhile, spread butter on one side of each triangular piece of bread.
Put some egg-mixture on a piece of bread.
Pour some cheese over it.
Set another piece of bread
On this make sure to put the butter-spread side on the mixture.
Place the raw sandwitches carefully, inside the sandwitch-maker.
Fry until the machine shows that they are ready to be taken out.
After taking out the first set of sandwitches, apply some oil or butter on the upper side of bread pieces along with applying it inside.
Serve with tomato chutney, or tomato sauce.

recipeName: Grated Yummy Boiled Egg Sandwich with Chilli Sauce and Mayo
tag: Indian Tiffin Box, Lunch box, Dabba
recipeDescription: Grated Boiled Egg Sandwich is a protein rich recipe for kids lunch box and even for elders. Quick and simple recipe. that gets ready in just few minutes. Loved by children of all ages.
preparationMethod: Remove the crust from all the bread slices and discard them.
Place the 4 bread slices on a clean dry surface.Grate one boiled egg on each slice and sprinkle salt and pepper to your taste.
Spread the red chili sauce on the remaining 4 bread slices and place over the bread slices with eggs, with the chilli sauce side facing downwards.
Yummy Grated Boiled Egg Sandwich is ready to serve or filled in lunch box.
Garnish the sandwiches with mayonnaise and tomato ketchup.
You can also put grated cheese above the sandwich if your kids like that.

recipeDescription: A simple to make tikka recipe which can also be served in any indian parties. . A perfect cocktail snack!
preparationMethod: Put the oil,onions and garlic in a microwave safe bowl and cover and microwave on high for 2 minutes. Keep aside.
Combine the besan with 2 1. 2 cups water and whisk well.
Add this to the onions and microwave at 80% for 4 minutes, stirring once in between.
Add the remaining ingredients and microwave on high for 4 minutes, stirring once in between.
Remove mixture onto a tray and spread into a ½” thick rectangle.
Cool completely and cut into square pieces.
Heat the oil in a pan and add the besan tikkas and fry till they turn golden brown.
Serve with coconut chutney.

recipeDescription: An interesting sandwich recipe, Green bread has a green spinach based spicy filling layered between the slices. Relish the green bread with grated cheese sprinkled over it as a snack or tiffin.
preparationMethod: In a mixture add coriander leaves,mint leaves,garlic and grind to form a paste.
Remove this in a pan add to this all the ingredients except for the pavs(bread>,
Tomato and oil.
Mix well .
Now cut each pav into 2 horizontally and dip in the
Batter made in the bowl.
Heat a pan add 4 to 5 spoons
Of oil add place the dipped
Pav one by one in the pan.
On the top of each pav place
3 to 4 fairly chopped pieces
Of tomato cook the pav on
Both sides till crisp

recipeDescription: An ideal dip for momos, garlic breads, and starters.
preparationMethod: Heat the oil in a deep pan, add onions and garlic and saute till they turn pink in colour.Remove from the flame and allow it to cool.
Combine all the ingredients in a mixer and blend till smooth thick paste.Add 1/4 cup of water if required.
Blend till only a few small pieces of garlic are undone. This shall add a crunchy twist to the dish.
Serve with snacks of your choice.

recipeDescription: Green Grape Salsa, a unique ingredient use to make salsa but it taste good.
preparationMethod: Combine all the ingredients in a bowl and mix well.
Serve with bread, nacho chips or with crackers.

recipeDescription: It is a refreshing drink made from green kiwifruit and cranberry juice.
preparationMethod: Combine the scooped kiwi fruit and ginger and blend in a mixer till it becomes pueed, making sure that the kiwifruit seeds are not broken.
Add the cranberry juice and blend again till smooth.
Place the ice in serving glasses and pour the liquid.
Serve immediately garnished with mint leaves.

ingredients: salt freshly ground black pepper powder
recipeDescription: This sandwich is healthy to eat and a also a famous party snack. Serve with tangy green chutney.
preparationMethod: Butter the bread slices on side and keep aside.
Combine the paneer, tomato, coriander, salt and black pepper in a bowl and mix well.
Fill this mixture between two bread slices on the unbuttered side.
Toast it in sandwich toaster.
Serve with tomato ketchup or pudina chutney.

recipeDescription: The hakka noodles is a popular Chinese noodle preparation with a delectable combination of Chinese noodles with sauces. The vegetables and noodles are cooked together in a hot, sweet and sour sauce which is sure to tantalize your taste buds. A healthy accompaniment , salad or main course recipe, hakka noodle is best paired with chilli vegetable or Manchurian!
preparationMethod: Heat the oil in a wok or frying pan on a high flame. add the garlic and red chillies and stir fry over a high flame for a few seconds.
Add the cabbage, capsicum, spring onions and ajinomoto and cook on a high flame for 2 minutes.
Add the noodles, chilli oil and salt, mix well and cook for 1 minute.
Serve hot.

recipeDescription: This dosa is very healthy and feeling.childrn sometimes hate to eat daal chawal but they will eat this dosa as is is tasty as well
preparationMethod: Soak all ingridints for 1/2 hour then grind it [not very smooth but little corse]then add salt and all ingridients,mix well n make dosa.dust pan with little oil then sprad batter and cover it with lid.cook it on high flame. cook both sides.serve it hot with green chatani or sauce

recipeDescription: A hot and spicy dip made with celery, broccoli, onions and red pepper mixed with cheese and butter.
preparationMethod: Cook celery, red pepper, onion and margarine in skillet over. Medium heat, stirring constantly until tender.
Reduce heat to low.
Add cheese stir until melted.
Stir in broccoli/spinach and hot sauce. Heat thoroughly, stirring constantly.
Serve hot with veggies and crackers.
Makes about 4 cups.

ingredients: salt freshly ground black pepper powder
recipeDescription: A hot variation to the popular cold cucumber soup, the hot cucumber soup is simply irrestible. The grated cucumbers , a dash of butter and seasonings make this soup a healthy soothing choice.
preparationMethod: Heat the butter in a broad pan, add the onions and saute till they turn transparent.
Add the plain flour, vegetables stock, mix well and bring the liquid to boil.
Add the cucumber and cook till the cucumber becomes tender and are cooked, while stirring in between.
Remove from the flame, cool and blend in a mixer till smooth.
Add the salt and pepper, mix well and serve hot garnished wth cream.

recipeDescription: Hot pot marconi is a simple and balanced meal in itself. The pasta is boiled and then thrown in the pot with cheese, chopped veggies and herbs and sauces of choices.
preparationMethod: Boil macroni in salted water until cooked.
Put oil in the pan
Saute onions until slightly brown, add green bell pepper,
Add beans with tomato sauce, ketchup, hot sauce, oregano, italian seasoning, peprika, macroni, stir nicely
Empty the pan into the baking tray and add cheese evenly,
Preheat oven to 350`d f, bake for 15 min or until cheese is melted.
Serve hot with garlic bread

recipeDescription: 1. cut vegetables into long pieces. 2. capsicum should be cooked before putting in the kadai with other vegetables since it is raw.. 3. to boil the macaroni put little oil in it so that it will not stick to each other.
preparationMethod: Heat oil in a kadai,put dry onions in it, stir for 2 to 3 mins,put adrak lasun paste,stir for 1 min,put tomato pieces,stir for 1 min,put boiled vegetables,salt,tomato sauce,,dhania jeera powder,red chilli powder in it, stir for 2 to 3 mins.
Then at the end put the boiled macroni into it..

recipeDescription: A delicious soup made with matki and sevred with farsan and pau/bread
preparationMethod: Wash and soak matki fro 6 hrs.
Drain Water from matki and pressure cook till 2 whistle without water.
Grind coconut,green chillies and coriander to a fine paste.
Heat oil in a thick vessel add coconut paste to it fry for 2 min till oil oozes out of it .
Add the matki and fry for 2 min and add the chilli powder, turmeric powder, salt and garam masala,tomato puree saute for 2 min.
Add 3 big cups of water to it let it come to boil.
Close with lid and on on low flame let it cook for 15 minutes.
Garnish with coriander leaves
Serve hot soup with sev and Butter.

recipeDescription: A delciious jain paneer bhurji recipe!
preparationMethod: Heat oil in a non-stick pan and add cumin seeds and ginger to the pan and sauté.
Add green chillies and capsicum and sauté.
Add turmeric powder, garam masala and coriander and mix.
Add cottage cheese and salt and mix everything well.
Transfer into a bowl and set aside.
To make tomato cups, cut off a thin slice from the top of each tomato and remove the pulp.
Cut off a thin slice from the bottom of the tomatoes so that they can stand upright.
Stuff them with the paneer bhurjee and arrange them in a glass bowl. Grill in a microwave for 4 minutes.
Serve hot.

recipeDescription: A delicious sweet and tangy chutney recipe!
preparationMethod: Heat the oil in a kadhai, add the onions and saute till they turn golden brown.
Add the tomatoes, chillies and tamarind and saute for 5 minutes.
Cool and blend in a mixer till smooth. Keep aside.
Heat the sesame oil in a small pan and add the mustard seeds and curry leaves.
When the seeds crackle, pour this tempering to the chutney and mix well.
Store refrigerated.

recipeDescription: A famous spicy vegetable. . Which is enjoyed by everyone!
preparationMethod: Heat the oil in a pan, add the garlic paste, ginger paste and onions and saute till the onions turn brown in colour.
Add the red chillies, coriander powder and salt and mix well.
Add the green chillies and tomato puree, mix well and cook on a slow flame, while stirring continously, till the oil gets separated. Keep aside.
Heat the oil in another kadhai, add the ginger paste and saute for 2 minutes.
Add the mushrooms, capsicums, salt and garam masala, mix well and cook for 3 to 4 minutes. Keep aside.
Place the cooked mushrooms on a serving plate, pour the gravy on top and sprinkle kasoori methi and garam masala.
Serve hot.

recipeDescription: Bittergourd onion recipe that will leave you wanting more and licking your fingers
preparationMethod: Peel the skin of karela and cut it into small pieces
Soak the pieces in little salt and tamarind water for atleast 5-6 hours.
Squeeze all the excess water from the karela pieces and keep aside.
Heat the oil in a pan and fry the karela pieces till light golden brown few pieces at a time and keep aside.
Roast the cumin seeds, corriander seeds, dry red chillies lightly till the aroma of the spices is released.
Grind the onions, tamarind, spices(jeera, dhaniya, redchillies, turmeric, chilli powder, salt) and garlic cloves to a paste.
Heat the oil(used for frying karela pieces) and put the paste and cook till the paste starts releasing the oil.
Now add the karela pieces and mix well.
Serve hot.

recipeDescription: Ladies fingers filled with a stffing of grate coconut mixed with various spices and condiments and fried crispy.
preparationMethod: Slit the ladies finger vertically and keep aside.
Stuff each ladies finger with the prepared stuffing mixture and keep aside.
Heat oil in a pan and add the cumin seeds.
When the seeds crackle, add the green chillies and stffed ladies finger and saute for 5 minutes.
Mix well and cook for 10 minutes, or till the ladies finger becomes soft.
Serve hot with chapatti or any stuffed paratha’s.

ingredients: capsicum, sliced into thin and long strips
recipeDescription: Kasadiya is a dip made from onionS, tomato and garlic and then enjoyed as accompaniment with starters or as spread on tortillas.
preparationMethod: Make a thick gravy of onions(half finely chopped and half churned), tomatoes and garlic.
Add some vinegar to this.
Add salt and chilli powder according to taste.
On a tortilla, spread the batter and over this some thin slices of onions, capsicum and cheese.
On another tortilla spread ketchup and put it over the first one(make it like a sandwich)
On a pan cook both side with oil. serve hot

recipeDescription: Enjoy these laddoos for the up coming winter.
preparationMethod: Heat the ghee in a pan and put dates and prunes and sauteed till both becomes soft.
Remove from the flame and add dry coconut,almond,cashewnuts and raisins and mix well.
Roll it into small balls to make 10 laddoos.

recipeDescription: This is a very instant recipe with a unique taste all will enjoy.
preparationMethod: Keep the oil in a kadai and when it is hot, add finely chopped green chillies.
Add finely cut onions, and fry till golden.
Add finely cut tomatoes and fry till they are cooked.
Add chaat masala, chilli sauce and tomato sauce and fry for a minute.
Add the crumbled left-over cake to this and salt to taste.
Saute for just a minute and garnish with coriander.
Eat hot with a steaming cup of tea.

recipeDescription: A novel soup recipe, lemongrass and chili soup is a vegetable soup with a difference. The lemon grass and chili combination is unusual but in the soup tastes great. A perfect winter soup recipe.
preparationMethod: In medium saucepan, heat vegetable broth to a simmer with lemon grass stalks and dried lime leaves if desired.

In small skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat. add garlic and ginger and cook, stirring often, about 30 seconds. when broth has simmered for 5 minutes, remove lemon grass and lime leaves and discard. add cooked garlic and ginger to broth. return broth to a boil and stir in chile paste and mushrooms
Cook until mushrooms have wilted, about 30 seconds, then stir in lime juice and soy sauce. remove from heat and ladle soup into small bowls.
Top each bowl with a few tomatoes, a little cilantro and a small pinch of hot green chilies if desired.
Alternatively, mix tomatoes and chilies together and place in a small serving bowl. set on the table for people to help themselves.

recipeDescription: Enjoy this delicious ,crunchy and healthy lemony cabbage salad seasoned with vinegar and white pepper. A must try for all health conscious people and weight watchers.
preparationMethod: In a bowl put the paneer,capsicum and cabbage.
Pour the lemon juice and vinegar over the salt and pepper powder.
Set aside.
Toss just before serving.
Enjoy this lemony crunchy and healthy salad and forget about the inches u'll put on.

recipeDescription: A tempting mushroom recipe with lemony taste is a nice variation. Lemony mushroom is simple and quick to prepare with unique flavours.
preparationMethod: Heat the oil in a pan, add the mushrooms and saute on a medium flame for 2 minutes.
Remove and keep aside.
In the same pan and oil, add the onions and saute for 1 minute.
Add the tomato, ginger-garlic paste, chaat masala, green chillies, coriander, mix well and cook for 1 minute.
Cool and add the lemon juice and mix well.
Add the mushrooms and mix well and cook for more 30 seconds.
Serve hot.

recipeDescription: Usually we love chinese but what if you are on a diet to lose weight try this you will definitely not miss chinese or tasty food more over this is low in calories and low in fat.
preparationMethod: Heat oil on high flame.
Sauté onions garlic ginger for 1 minute.
Add all other ingredients mix well cook for 2 minutes.
Serve hot.

recipeDescription: Fast, easy to cook, munching snacks.
preparationMethod: Combine all the ingredients in a bowl, mix well and knead into a smooth dough.
Make medium sized balls and roll in to flat thin circles.
Using a knife, cut ½ inch pattis.
Heat the oil and deep fry the pattis till they turn golden brown and crisp.
Serve hot or cool and store in an air-tight container.

recipeDescription: Namkeen burfi presents quite an interesting savory snack recipe prepared by cooling together gram flour or besan with salt, red chilli and then made into barfis.
preparationMethod: Heat a pan and roast besan till golden brown.
Add 1 cup of water and the remaining ingredients, mix well and transfer in a microwave safe bowl.
Microwave on high for 4 to 5 minutes or till cooked or set.
Cut into desired pieces and serve.

recipeDescription: A different and unique pizza with noodles as a topping. Garnish with Italian herbs.
preparationMethod: On the pizza bread,apply a layer of chilli sauce.
Spread a layer of boiled noodles evenly upon the sauce.
Mix the remaining sauce with the vegetables and spread upon the noodles evenly.
Top it with mozzarella cheese and coriander .
Bake in the oven for 8 minutes at 300 degrees f.
Serve hot.

ingredients: salt freshly ground black pepper powder
preparationMethod: Heat the butter in a pan,add the ginger and onions.
Add capsicum,saute for 2 minutes. Add 1 tsp maida and roast a little.
Add chilli powder and tomato puree. Stir fry till dry.
Add rajma, macaroni, ketchup, salt and pepper.
Transfer in a greased baking dish.
Sprinkle grated cheese on top and Bake for 10 minutes at 180 degrees or till the cheese melts.
Serve hot.

recipeDescription: Tasty and spicy version od the famous macaroni and cheese preparation with chillies.
preparationMethod: Boil the macaroni in enough water till 3/4 cooked.
Drain the water in a colander and keep aside.
Heat a kadai and add oil and butter on small flame.
Add tomato puree, salt, red chilli powder, black pepper powder, green chillies,and saute for some time till the tomato is cooked and the oil seperates.
Toss in the macaroni along with the spring onion.
Switch off the gas and remove pan from fire.
Add the grated cheese and mix gently till the cheese melts.
Serve immediately as a snack.

recipeDescription: A delicious fusion of mini gulab jamuns, crumbled boondi laddoos and rabdi.
preparationMethod: Crumble the boondi laddoos in a bowl.
Add the almonds and cashewnuts, mix well.
Spread the boondi evenly in a microwave safe dish.
Spread the mini gulab jamuns on top of it now spread the rabdi evenly on top of the gulab jamuns.
Cook in microwave at microwave on HIGH for 5 minutes or cook till the upper portion turns to light brown in colour.
Remove the dish from the microwave and sprinkle the milk masala over it.
Serve hot.

recipeDescription: The malai patta or a creamy leafy vegetable recipe is prepared from spring onions. The chopped spring onion is cooked with tomatoes and spices and then added with the fresh cream or malai to render that delicious creamy taste and a lovely texture.
preparationMethod: Heat the oil in a pan and put in the chopped spring onion leaves.
Saute them for about 5 minutes.
Then add chopped tomatoes and cook till soft.
Now add the red chill powder and salt.
Cover and cook till the spring onion is properly cooked.
Lastly add the malai and mix well and take off from the fire.
Serve hot with hot rotis.

recipeDescription: Don't reheat after grinding and cut large pieces of tomatoes.
preparationMethod: Heat oil in a pan
Put onions and fry till they are soft
Add tomatoes and fry till they are soft
Add salt and red chilly powderand turn the gas off
Add malai to it and grind it hot with hand grinder
Serve hot with hot toast, use it as a spread.

recipeDescription: Masala egg bread is an interesting breakfast or packed tiffin choice, with the bread slices dipped in spicy egg mixture and then shallow fried. Enjoy the masala egg bread with ketchup or green coriander chutney.
preparationMethod: Beat the eggs thorougly and keep aside
Cut onions , tomato , green chilli and coriander and mix them together
Put salt and red chillie poweder to the mixture
Add 2 spoons beated eggs in the mixute
Dip a slice of bread in the egg mixutre and put it on the pan , cover the bread with the onion mixture and cook for 1-2 minutes reverse the side with the onion mixture and cook for another minute.
Serve hot with chili / tomato ketchup

recipeDescription: Masala macaroni is a mouthwatering pasta recipe cooked in the traditional Indian way with select spice powders or masalas. The boiled macaroni is tossed with onion, tomato, ginger, garlic and garam masala and served hot. A true fusion recipe of Italian macaroni pasta enrobed in Indian flavours.
preparationMethod: Boil enough water in a deep non-stick pan, add macaroni, salt and few drops of oil. Cook till macaroni is cooked which will take approx. 8 minutes. Drain the water and keep the pasta aside.
Heat the oil in a broad non-stick pan, add the garlic and ginger and sauté on a medium flame for 1 minute.
Add the onions and sauté on a medium flame for 2 minutes.
Add the tomatoes, chilli powder, seasoning cube, mix well and cook on a medium flame for 3 minutes, while stirring occasionally.
Add the capsicum, tomato ketchup, salt and 2 tbsp of water, mix well and cook on a medium flame for 2 minutes, while stirring occasionally.
Add the boiled pasta, mix gently and cook on a medium flame for 2 minutes, while tossing occasionally.
Serve hot.

recipeDescription: Masala Papad is a popular starter dish amongst many families when dining at a restaurant / hotel. Go to any restaurant / hotel, masala papad is a first order placed by any group of generations. Its that tempting and delicious that from youngsters to elders prefer it. It's so easy to make too also. Papad is fried / roasted and topped with onions, tomatoes and some spices. The adding of lime juice makes a wonder to it.
preparationMethod: In a bowl take chopped onion, tomato, green chili, coriander leaves and add salt, red chili powder and mix well. Add lemon juice and keep ready aside.
Roast the papad.
Place the roasted papad in a plate.
Top it up with the onion tomato topping spreading equally all over.
Garnish with sev.
Serve immediately.
Papad can also be fried or baked. Frying will give a much more yummier taste.
Serve immediately as the water left from onion, tomato, lemon juice from the topping will make the papad soggy in few minutes.

recipeDescription: A snack finger licking dish made spicy and tongue tickling!
preparationMethod: Combine all the ingredients, except the bread and egg and blend in a mixer till smooth.
Add the paste to the beaten egg and mix well.
Heat the tava, dip the bread in the egg masala and toast on a tava using oil till cooked from both the sides.
Serve hot.

recipeDescription: Use as a cheese sauce for macaroni or on veggies or whatever you like.
preparationMethod: Blend all ingred. in blender till very smooth. pour in a saucepan and cook on med. heat until thick, wisking constantly.

recipeDescription: Enjoy the subtly spiced paneer extravaganz, paneer jalfrezi which is prepared with paneer and onion and capsicum tossed together ina rich dry fruit based paste and fresh cream. The paneer jalfrezi is a party special paneer recipe, which may be served to guests on gatherings and social functions.
preparationMethod: Heat oil in a kadhai and add cumin seeds.
When the seeds crackle, add the red chilies and saute for few seconds.
Add the ginger and onions and saute for 2 minutes.
Add the red chili powder, turmeric powder and capsicum pieces and cook for a few minutes.
Add the paneer pieces and toss gently.
Add the salt, vinegar, tomato pieces, garam masala, mix well and cook for 2-3 minutes.
Serve hot,garnished with coriander.

recipeDescription: Minestrone soup is a popular Italian thick soup recipe with beans,vegetables and cheese. Enjoy the mouthwatering minestrone soup to beat the winter blues.
preparationMethod: In a pan boil tomato puree, ginger, water and milk.
Add cabbage, macroni, salt and pepper.
Boil well.
Sprinklegrated cheese and serve hot.

recipeDescription: Mini pizza is a coin shaped round pizza recipe with vegetables and cheese as topping. A step to step guide for preparing pizza base at home and then topping it with a delectable combination of veggies, sauces and cheese.
preparationMethod: Slit the buns in half
Put the oil in microwave safe dish.heat at 100%power for 2 min
Drop chille,onion,garlic and continue to cook.add tomato.oregano,puree,ketchup and cook uncovered for 5 min.
Put some tomato puree on each bun.srinkle the cooked onion and tomatoes.
Cover it with grated cheese
Peheat the microwave with 100%grill.
Cook the buns till cheese gets melted
Prefer lightly roasted buns before spreading the mixture.

recipeDescription: A delicious colourful saag.
preparationMethod: Combine the spinach and mustard leaves and blend in a mixer into a fine paste along with green chillies.
Cut paneer into square cubes and keep aside.
Heat the oil in a pan, add the cumin seeds.
When the seeds crackle, add the garlic and sauté for half a minute.
Add the spinach puree and stir.
Check seasoning, add water if required.
When the gravy comes to a boil, add the paneer and mix well. Stir in lemon juice.
Finally add fresh cream. Serve hot with makki roti.

recipeDescription: Mixed vegetable curry for chapati, parotta or naan.
preparationMethod: Heat oil and fry onion.
Grind jeera, green chili, ginger, garlic and fry adding to the mixture for 30seconds.
Add all the spice powders and fry for a minute.
Add the tomato puree.
Add the coconut milk and let it boil
Add the cut vegetables, salt and let it cook firm.
Add coriander leaves and boil for a min.

recipeDescription: Refreshing summer sandwich which I enjoyed this summer in moab, Utah in the arches national park
preparationMethod: Spread guacamole on one slice of bread.
Spread the jam on the other slice of bread.
Layer with green pepper and cucumber slices.
Top with sprouts and cheese.
Enjoy.

recipeDescription: Mock pizza is amini pizza recipe with vegetables and cheese as topping. A step to step guide for preparing pizza base at hoem and then topping it with a delectable combination of veggies, sauces and cheese.
preparationMethod: Mix flour with salt mustard powder and cheese

Gradually mix in milk and make soft dough on a floured board 8 mm thickness and cut small rounds with a cutter. arrange pizza rounds on a greased baking tray and bake at 200degree c till light brown in colour
Remove from the oven and put topping on each one and bake againtill cheese melts.
For topping
Heat oil and vegetables and saute over high flame.mix in salt, aji-no-moto,soya sauce. remove after two minutes.put one spoonful on each pizza.top with ketchup and cheese
Bake at 200degreec on the upper shelf till cheese melts. serve hot.

recipeDescription: You can take other toppings of your choice such as cheese or paneer etc.
preparationMethod: Spread butter evenly over each biscuit.
Sprinkle some tomatoes and onions over each biscuit.
Put some dhaniya leaves over each biscuit.
Serve immediately.
This quick snack is easy to make and very tasty indeed.

recipeDescription: Every bite of delicious Moong chaat is sure to tingle your taste buds and also fill you up with the goodness of moong sprouts. A crunchy and protein rich salad recipe, moong salad makes every meal a healthy one!
preparationMethod: mix sprouted moong beans with chopped onions, chopped capsicum, chopped tomatoes and chopped green chilies.
Refrigerate for half an hour.
Make a dressing by mixing lime juice, chaat masala and salt.
Mix dressing with sprouted moong and vegetables at the time of serving

recipeDescription: It's quick, not a lot of mess. it taste very good, very healthy because there is no oil or butter.
preparationMethod: Break eggs in the bowl.
Add salt and pepper.
If you like then add onions, tomatoes, green chili, and little bit of garlic powder.
Don''t want to add a lot of garlic powder, because of salt.
And wisk, then put it in microwave for about 2-3 mins.

recipeDescription: A peppery tangy soup.
preparationMethod: Heat the butter in a deep pan, add the onions and garlic ad saute till the onions turn transparent.
Add the capsicum and saute for 1 minute.
Add the tomatoes and mushrooms, mix well and saute till mushrooms are cooked.
Add the stock, mix well and boil for 5 minutes.
Add the salt and pepper and mix well.
Serve hot.

recipeDescription: Tingle your senses with the delicious Onion buttered broccoli vegetable dish and enjoy with any breads of choice as side dish. The rich butter flavour enrobes the broccoli which has been stir fried with onions and select seasonings. Use the same recipe to prepare almond butter broccoli by replacing the onions with the almonds.
preparationMethod: Remove and discard outer leaves and cut off the ends of stalks from the broccoli. soak broccoli 20-30 minutes in salted water. split heavy stalks lengthwise, about 1/2 inch. cook broccoli in sauce pan until tender and drain.
In a small skillet, heat butter and onion and mix in pepper. pour onion mixture over broccoli. serve immediately.

recipeDescription: Every indian household swears by its own traditional onion chutney recipe. A spicy and tangy onion chutney is prepared from raw onions, garlic and coriander leaves. Serve with pakodas or tikkas.
preparationMethod: Heat the oil in a pan, add the onions, green chillies and garlic and saute till onions turn golden brown.
Add the tomatoes and saute till they turn soft.
Cool and blend in a mixer till smooth.
Use as required.

recipeDescription: Eat tasty and be tasty
preparationMethod: Mix all the ingreidents prooperly except bread
Put this mixture on each
Slice of bread and properly spread it on the slices
Put some oil on pan and fry each slices one by one
Onion tomato sandwich is ready
Serve hot with green chutney or sauce

recipeDescription: A simple toast recipe, Onion tomato toast is made by filling up the slices of bread with onion and tomato slices. A toasted sandwich recipe, onion tomato toast can also be enjoyed plain as cold sandwich with ketchup.
preparationMethod: Mix all the ing and place it on top of the bread.
Pour 1,2t.sp oil in a pan.firstly brown bread from plain side and roast it from other side.serve hot

ingredients: thin white bread slices brown bread slices
recipeDescription: Can be made 2-3 hours in advance. can be served for cocktail parties, children's parties and they look lovely for high tea presentation. for weight conscious persons use low fat cheese spread. can also garnish with red-yellow-green peppers or a piece of celery cut into diamond shape.
preparationMethod: Cut the cucumber in 1/4 inch slices. stamp out 20 hearts (small size).
Spread cream cheese on bread. stamp out hearts (big size).
Dip the egdes in parsley - should surround the entire edge.
Top with cucumber heart.
Sprinkle with salt and pepper.
Add a drop of mint chutney if you like.
Serve chilled or at room temperature

ingredients: salt freshly ground black pepper powder
recipeDescription: Prepare the open paneer sandwich and serve as breakfasts or packed lunch option for children. The mildly spiced up crumbled paneer topping over the bread slice improves the taste and health quotient of this sandwich recipe. Enjoy plain or toasted with ketchup.
preparationMethod: Heat the oil in the kadhai, add the onions and saute till they turn pink in colour.
Add the tomatoes cook for 5 minutes.
Add the green chillies, salt, pepper, garma masala and paneer, mix well and saute fr 2 minutes.
Apply on toast and serve immediately.

recipeDescription: Open pasta sandwich is an innovative sandwich recipe with pasta and creamy sauce added as topping on a slice of bread and enjoyed as breakfast or snack item.
preparationMethod: Heat the butter & fry onions till transparent.
Add garlic paste.saute for few seconds.
Add spaghetti or noddles and mix well.
Add grated cheese leaving some for topping.
Add green chilli,tomato ketchup,salt and pepper.
Butter the toasted slices of bread spread noodles mixture on it.
Grate some cheese finely over it cut & serve.

recipeDescription: Mushrooms and capsicum is a novel combination and accompanied with specific masalas are sure to work wonders to our taste buds. Mushroom and capsicum fry is a tasty and colorful dish which can be served with roti or paratha.
preparationMethod: Heat the oil in a pan, add the onions, green chillies and ginger and saute on a medium flame for 2 minutes.
Add the capiscum, mushroom, chilli powder and salt and saute for 2 to 4 minutes.
Add the tomato sauce and sprinkle little water and simmer for 2 minutes on a medium flame.
Serve hot.

tag: Chunky Jain soups, Creamy Jain soups
recipeDescription: Cauliflower soup is a novel soup recipe with cauliflower florets. A creamy, delicious cauliflower soup which is sure to tickle your taste buds. The vitamin a in celery is an antioxidant which helps to keep the lining of the arteries in good health. Being extremely low in fat and free from cholesterol, this delectable cauliflower soup is a perfect appetizer for those "heart conscious" people.
preparationMethod: Boil enough water in a deep pan and add the cauliflower and salt, mix well and cook till the florets are cooked.
Cool and blend in a mixer to a smooth paste.
Add the milk and pepper, mix well and bring the mixture to boil.
Serve hot.

recipeDescription: 1)you can add a few drops of vanilla essence for better taste. 2)you can use dark or normal chocolate according to your liking 3)you can exclude almonds or cherries if you unlike them.
preparationMethod: Grate the chochlate
Melt the chochlate
Now add a bit of fresh cream to the melted chochlate
Now beat the mixture using a beater
Slowly add the remaining fresh cream and again beat the mixture till light and fluffy
Arrange in serving bowls and allow it to set in the refrigerator for 2 or 3 hours
Garnish using almonds and cherries
Your chochlate mousse is ready to serve

recipeDescription: Quick gravy is a quick recipe to prepare the traditional favorite Indian spicy gravy. Mouthwatering, easy to prepare and a perfect dish when running short of time!
preparationMethod: Finely chop onion, tomatoe,capsicum n green chilly.
Fry onion till golden brown and add tomato,g.chilly and capsicum.mix well.
Now add tomato sauce and chilly powder.mix well.
Now add little water to get a gravy form.garnish with coriander leaves

recipeDescription: Quick noodles is a quick recipe to dish out stir fried noodles and vegetables enrobed in delectable sauces as meal or snack.
preparationMethod: Fry the onion's till golden brown.
Add the tomato &salt with green chillies,leave it to a little heat.
Keep the noodles in the calm water or boil for 1 min.do not over cook.
Add the noodles in the fry pan&cook for 1-2 min.
Serve hot with onion ,tomato, coriander garnish(can add boiled egg cut into rings also)

ingredients: salt freshly ground black pepper powder
recipeDescription: This is quick make as starters or even a healthy snacks for children.
preparationMethod: Combine all the ingredients, except the bread slices in a bowl and mix well.
Place the bread slices on a clean and dry surface and spread the mixture evenly on 4 slices of bread.
Cover them with remaining 4 slices and bake in a pre-heated oven till crisp.
Serve hot.

recipeDescription: These bites are quick to make and a sure hit for parties or starters with drinks
preparationMethod: Mix all the ingredients in a bowl without mashing the paneer cubes
Preheat oven at 200 degrees celcius.
Brush the bread slices with butter on both the sides.
Spread the mixture evenly over the bread slices on one side and bake in oven on 200 degrees celcius for 15 mins.
Cut into squares and serve with a sauce/chutney of your choice.
You can also alternatively deep fry the bread slices

recipeDescription: Quick paneer veggie is a quick recipe to prepare the favorite mix vegetable with paneer. Mouthwatering, easy to prepare quick paneer veggie is a perfect dish when running short of time!
preparationMethod: Combine all ingredients, except the oil, kasturi methi and paneer, and blend in a mixer till smooth.
Heat the oil in a pressure cooker, add the puree and saute for 2 minutes.
Cover and pressure cook for 3 minutes or 1 whistle.
Cool, add the paneer and kasturi methi, mix well and cook for another 2-3 mins.
Serve hot garnished with corinader and fresh cream.

recipeDescription: Add health and taste on your breakfast table with the easy to prepare quick porridge recipe. The leftover boondi or gram flour laddoos are crushed and added to milk along with nuts and served as a porridge.
preparationMethod: Boil milk for 5 minutes.
Pour the milk into a serving bowl
Add the almonds and cashunuts , cardmum powder .
Break the ladoos into small pieces and mix it with the milk.
Instant porridge is ready to eat

tag: Indian Tiffin Box, Lunch box, Dabba
recipeDescription: It is a very quick, simple and easy dish. It gives a spicy flavour to your mouth. It is a very simple yet very tasty recipe.
preparationMethod: Heat a kadhai, add oil.
Add cumin seeds, let it splutter then add onions of spring onions with green chillies. Let it cook for 2 minutes.
Now add ginger garlic paste, let it cook for 2 minutes.
Now add tomatoes, turmeric powder, spring onions, salt and water.
Now close it with a lid and let it cook for 15 minutes on medium flame.
Serve hot with chappatis or puris.

recipeDescription: This recipe gives wonderful taste and good flavour and nutritious for lactating women.
preparationMethod: Preheat oven to 350 c .
Combine beans, tomatoes, basil,salt and pepper , garlic.
Arrange bread on baking sheet .
Bake for 4-5 minutes until light brown and crisp.
Remove the bread from the oven.
Rub both the sides with garlic .
Spread bean mixture over the bread baguette slices .
Top with the cheese and bake for another 4-5 minutes until brown.

ingredients: salt freshly ground black pepper powder
recipeDescription: A superb delicate combination of tomatoes and celery...
preparationMethod: Combine the tomato juice, celery juice, salt, pepper, ice, Tabasco and Worcestershire sauce in a cocktail shaker.
Shake well, strain and pour into glass.
Garnish with tomato slices and serve.

recipeDescription: Its papular and so tasty dish. Enjoy with puri and paratha. A special baingan bharta for all your family.
preparationMethod: Wash and roast the brinjal on an open flame till they turn soft and tender from inside.
Cool and peel the skin and mash them well and keep aside.
Mash the tomatoes as well and keep aside.
Heat the oil in a pan and add the cumin seeds.
when the seeds crackle, add the asafoetida and saute for 10 seconds.
Add the ginger, garlic and green chillies and saute for a minute.
Add the onions and saute till they turn golden brown.
Add the chilli powder, turmeric powder and tomatoes and mix well.
Add the salt and cook till tomatoes leaves oil from sides.
Add the brinjal and cook for more 10 minutes.
Add lemon juice and mix well and cook for about 8-10 minutes.
Serve hot garnished with coriander.

recipeDescription: A north indian paneer recipe, saag paneer is a tempting paneer or cottage cheese recipe with chopped saag or palak leaves cooked with succulent paneer cubes.
preparationMethod: Heat the oil in a pan and add the cumin seeds, coriander seeds and cloves and saute for 10 seconds.
Add the onions, ginger-garlic paste and green chillies, mix well and saute till the onions turn translucent.
Add the tomatoes and cook till they become soft.
Add the salt and coriander powder and mix well.
Add the spinach paste and paneer, mix well and cook for 4 minutes.
Add the milk, mix well and cook for more 3 minutes.
Add the garam masala and kasoori methi, mix well and serve hot.

recipeDescription: Good and healthy for children who hate vegetables
preparationMethod: Chopped cucumber,tomato,onion
Then add green chilli sauce,tomato sauce,black pepper,salt mix wll.
Take a bread put in butter bothside
Then put vegetable mixer on bread then put on chess one slide
Put on bread. take this in toaster till light brown.
Ready to serve with onion and tomato sauce

recipeDescription: Sandwich is a simple recipe to prepare vegetable sandwiches with cheese as spread and green coriander chutney as accompaniment. Enjoy the sandwich plain, toasted or grilled as snack or tiffin.
preparationMethod: Mix the malai then mix all ingreients into the malai
take 1 bread & spread all the material on it and cover it with another bread,
Again spread matireal on it and cover it with third bread
Take toster (single one which we use on the gas)
And spread butter on it
And keep that sangwith
And press it very carefully there is no need of closing the toster very tightly
Keep it in your hand
From both sides it starts brown it means it' ready now u can eat this

recipeDescription: Simply follow the steps here and recreate the favorite sarson ka saag at home and enjoy it with makke ki roti (breads made from maize flour). The sarson ka saag is prepared from mustard greens and taste heavenly with dollops of butter added on the top.
preparationMethod: Chop spinach and mustard leaves,wash them and drain.
Heat oil in the pressure cooker.
Add drained greens, green chillies and stir.
Add ginger and garlic.
Add few pinches of salt and water.
Pressure cook till done(2 whistles).
Keep aside to cool and then blend to a coarse paste in a mixer.
Heat ghee in a pan, add onion and saute till brown.
Add the coarse paste,garam masala,maize flour and lemon juice.
Stir well and cook till the oil starts to separates.
Garnish with cheese.
Serve hot with makki ki roti or paratha.

recipeDescription: A dry mix of leftover rotis shredded into pieces mixed with other ingredients like chillies, corriander, tomatoes, garlic, etc.
preparationMethod: Break the roti in small pieces and keep aside.
Heat oil in kadhai and add the mustard seeds.
When the seeds crackle, add the garlic and green chillies and saute for few seconds.
Add the tomates and all the remaining ingredients, mix well and cook till the tomatoes are soft.
Add 1 cup of water and bring it to boil
Add the rotis, mix well and cover and cook till the water dries up and rotis get little soft.
Serve hot garnish with lime and coriander leaves.

recipeDescription: Scraped cauliflower fry is an innovative vegetable recipe with scraped or grated cauliflower stir fried with fried onions, turmeric powder and salt.
preparationMethod: Heat the oil in a kadai.
Put the mustard seeds.
After mustard seeds splutter add the green chillies and fry for a few seconds and then add the chopped onions.
Fry the onions till they become golden brown.
Then add the scraped cauliflower.
Add salt and turmeric.
Keep frying and the close it keeping it ajar.
After few minutes again fry it. once it is well cooked add the coconut.
It is ready to eat.

recipeDescription: A lovely dinner recipe!
preparationMethod: Sprinkle the pepper on spaghetti and keep aside.
Heat the butter in a broad pan and add the mustard powder.
Add the onions and saute for 2 to 3 minutes.
Add the spaghetti and tomato ketchup and toss well.
Cook for 3 minutes.
Serve hot.

recipeDescription: A recipe which can be served as a breakfast or a snack. . Serve it piping hot to enjoy it most!
preparationMethod: Combine the tomatoes, onion, green chiiles, coriander, cumin seeds, chaat masala, red chilli powder, salt, garam masala in a bowl and mix well.
Add the fresh cream and semolina and mix well.
Spread the mixture on a bread slice and sprinkle some dry semolina on it.
Heat a non-stick tava, grease it little ghee and place the bread slice with semolina facing downwards.
Apply ghee and cook it from both sides.
Serve hot with coriander chutney or tomato sauce.

recipeDescription: Speedy and charming little biscuits that make an ideal bed partner for your hot beverage of choice!
preparationMethod: Preheat the oven to 175 degree C (350 degree F).
In a bowl, cream together the butter, oil and honey until smooth.
Add the flour and yeast, sesame seeds, baking powder and pistachios and stir to combine.
Drop the dough in small ball shapes on to a nonstick baking tray.
Bake for 9-12 minutes until golden brown.
Allow to cool a few minutes on the baking tray.
Serve.

recipeDescription: If you want to add then tomato round slices in between.
preparationMethod: Take one slice bread spread tomatto ketchup.
After that spred sev.
After that on second slice spread pudina chatni.
Attach them and have it with tea or coffee or any type of milkshake.

recipeDescription: These sandwiches should be served immediately because the sev will become soft if kept for long time
preparationMethod: Spread tomato ketchup on 1 slice of bread & green chutney on another slice.
Put sev or mixture on 1 slice spread it properly & cover it with another slice.
cut it diagonaly.
Serve itimmidiately.

recipeDescription: While boiling eggs add the little vinegar eggs wont crack
preparationMethod: Fry the sevai
Add the ghee
Boil the milk and reduce on low flame
Add the sevai
Garnish with almonds and pistachio and elachi powder
Add the essence

recipeDescription: Seyal paav presents an awesome snack recipe with the pavs or Indian breads dipped in a spicy mixture comprising of ground masalas and chopped tomatoes.
preparationMethod: Wash n cut the corriander leaves,chillies,tomatoes and garlic , now griend all these coursly

Take a pan put oil in it and let it get hot put this ground masala in it add the dry masala n salt as per taste n let is fry on medium heat till the oil comeson the top , now add 1 cup of water to it n then dip the pav in it n let it be made for few min till the water dries .
Serve it hot.

recipeDescription: A delicious karanji made with dates!
preparationMethod: Grind the filling into a paste. Reserve.
Make a stiff dough with all other ingredients except ghee or oil for frying.
Divide the dough into small balls and roll out each to 8 cm disc.
Put a spoon of filling in the center and fold over.
Flute the edges to make a half moon shape.
Make all karanjis and leave to drop on a piece of muslin.
Deep fry in batches till golden and crisp.

recipeDescription: A royal mithai or laddo recipe, Shahi laddo is prepared by mixing together peda( khoya based mithai), sweet petha and chopped nuts.
preparationMethod: Grate the petha sweet and bafi.
Mix both very well.
Mix kaju or badam and cardamom powder to mixture.
Mix well and bind into small laddoos ,it will make 9-10 laddoos.
Cover the laddoos partially with silver foil.
Shahi laddoos are ready to be served.

recipeDescription: If you like the gravy to be very smooth, then after grinding the gravy strain it and then add the paste and water.
preparationMethod: Heat 2 tbsp of oil in a pan, add the onions and saute till they turn golden brown.
Add the ginger, garlic and chilli paste, mix well and saute till it is brown.
Add the tomatoes and saute for 6 to 8 minutes.
Cool and blend in a mixer to a puree.
Transfer in a kadhai, add 1/2 cup water and bring it to a boil on a slow flame.
Meanwhile, heat the oil in a kadhai and deep fry the paneer without browning them. Keep aside.
Add all the dry masala and salt to the puree and mix well.
Add the cashewnut paste and pinch of food colour, mix well and cook on a slow flame,for 5 minutes or till the gravy is thick.
Just before serving, heat the gravy and add the paneer pieces into it.
Serve hot garnish with corinder.

recipeDescription: A very healthy source of folate, fibre and vitamins A,C , D and E.
preparationMethod: Heat Oil in a kadai, add cumin seeds and red chillies.
When the seeds crackle, add the onion, garlic and ginger paste and saute for 2 minutes.
Add the beet puree, garam masala and salt and mix well and cook for 3-4 minutes.
Add the soya nuggets and simmer for 10 minutes.
Serve hot garnished with cream.

recipeDescription: A spicy eggplant or brinjal baigan) bharta recipe with roasted brinjals mashed and cooked with onion, tomato and ginger-garlic paste. The baigan bharta recipe is just rightly spiced to suit all palates. A simple yet unique variation to a typical brinjal preparation.
preparationMethod: Place the brinjal in pan, cover with foil and bake in a pre-heated oven at 275 degrees c for 20-30 minutes or until eggplant is soft.
Cool, peel and chop coarsely and keep aside.
Combine the onion, ginger, and garlic and blend in a mixer till smooth.
Heat the oil in a pan, add the pureed mixture and turmeric, mix well and saute for 5 minutes or till the mixture turnd brown.
Add the green chili and 1 tbsp coriander, mix well and saute for more 1 minute.
Add the tomatoes, mix well and simmer 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add the brinjal and cook on a medium flame for 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add the salt, lemon juice, coriander and cumin seeds, mix well and simmer for another 5 minutes.
Serve hot garnished with coriander.

recipeDescription: Simply Delicious Cheese Toast, it is a cheesy and little spicy toast.
preparationMethod: Combine the cheese slices, milk, green chillies, coriander, salt and roasted cumin powder in a blender and grind in to a coarse paste.
Transfer the mixture in a bowl and divide the mixture in to a equal portions.
Apply a portion of the mixture on a bread slices and spread it evenly covering the bread completely.
Spread little mozzarella cheese and 2 or 3 wedges of cherry tomatoes.
Sprinkle little black pepper and sesame seeds on top.
Bake in a hot oven at 300 degree Celsius for 7-8 minutes or till the cheese has melted and is slightly brown on top depending on your taste.
Remove from the oven and sprinkle some chopped basil/ mint on top.
Serve hot.

ingredients: salt, poppy seeds (khus-khus), caraway seeds (shahjeera) sesame seeds (til)
recipeDescription: These pretzels taste best when eaten on the day they are made. if you are going to store them, they may be wrapped in foil and reheated in the oven at 325 degrees.
preparationMethod: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees and prepare 2 sheet pans with parchment paper.

Combine the water, yeast and honey in a small bowl and let stand for five minutes, until yeast is dissolved and has proofed (you''ll notice tiny bubbles forming on the top of the water). in a large bowl, combine flour and salt. add the water/yeast mixture to the flour slowly and stir until a dough begins to form.

Turn the dough out onto a clean work surface and knead for 5-7 minutes or until the dough is smooth and elastic. divide the dough into 4 and then divide each of the smaller pieces into 4. you should have now 16 pieces! roll each piece into a “snake” and form into different shapes. you could try a classic pretzel shape, a knot, a letter or an animal
With a pastry brush, lightly apply the beaten egg to the pretzels (not so much that the egg drips down the sides). this will make them shiny and golden when baked.
Bake a 425 degrees for 17-20 minutes, or until pretzels are golden brown.

recipeDescription: Cut the lady's finger into two. to cut it easily..
preparationMethod: Wash the lady's fingers.
Cut long strips of the outer green skin only.
Cut the vegetable so as to leave behind the seeds.
Cut all in the same pattern, and try to cut them in thin strips.
Now when all is done, put some oil and fry them in it.
See that it remains cripsy, but doesn't burn.
Then serve in a plate with salt-redchillypowder or chat masala or black salt sprinkled on it.
Cut the tomato in a flower-shape.
Decorate it with cabbage around and tomato in the middle.
Serve:with soups,as starters,snacks.

ingredients: salt freshly ground black pepper powder
recipeDescription: This is an off-beat with veggies roasted on skewers!
preparationMethod: Heat 1/2 tsp oil in a pan and dry roast the semolina till it turns light pink in colour.
Remove and heat the remaining oil in the same pan, add the green chillies and saute for 30 seconds.
Meanwhile, bring 1 3/4 cup water to boil along with salt.
Add the semolina to the pan and the boiling water and cook for 5 minutes, stirring continuously.
Keep aside.
Arrange the vegetables alternatively in a skewer and sprinkle some salt and pepper.
Drizzle some oil and grill in a griller till it turns crisp.
Arrange the upma in a serving plate along with the vegetables skewers.
Serve immediately.

recipeDescription: Brinjal sambhar is a traditional south indian recipe with roasted or boiled brinjals mashed and then cooked with onion, tamarind pulp and ground coconut paste.
preparationMethod: Boil the brinjals with a pinch of turmeric, green chillies, and tomatoes in a deep pan, till they turn soft.
Drain the excess water and mash the brinjal nicely.
Add the salt, tamarind pulp and coconut, mix well and simmer till the mixture becomes thick,
Remove form the flame and keep aside.
For the tempering, heat the oil in a small pan and add the mustard seeds, cumin seeds, curry leaves and dry chillies and saute till the seeds crackle.
Pour this tempering on the brinjals and mix well.
Serve hot garnished with coriander.

recipeDescription: Soya bean bhaji or nutrela, soya chunks based subji serve with roti or with plain parathas.
preparationMethod: Soak the soya chunk in warm water for 10 minutes and give one boil to the chunks, remove from warm water and squeeze it thoroughly and keep aside.
Heat the oil in a kadhai, add the onions, green chillies, saute till the onion turns to golden brown.
Add the soya chunks, tomatoes, all dry masalas and salt, mix well and saute for 5 minutes on medium flame.
Add 2 cups water and simmer for 15 minutes.
Serve hot garnish with coriander.

recipeDescription: Soya bean burji is an innovative burji or crumbled up vegetable recipe with the soaked soybeans ground into a paste and then cooked with onion, chillies, spices and tomatoes.
preparationMethod: Chop onions, tomatoes, green chilies and coriander leaves to small pieces.
Soak soya beans in water for 3-4 hrs. grind the soaked soya beans in mixer grinder to a thin paste adding little water.
Add chopped onions, tomatoes, chilies, coriander leaves and salt to taste. mix well.
Take 2-3 tea spoon oil in a frying pan. when the pan heats up, put the above mixture and stir till the paste thickens. keep stirring until the mixture solidifies and turns light brown.
Decorate with coriander leaves and pepper powder
And serve

recipeName: Soya Beans Open Sandwich Using Pizza Base
recipeDescription: Its a open sandwich prepare with healthy soya beans on pizza base toast.
preparationMethod: Heat oil add cumin , when start spluttering, add chooped onion .Cook till translucent.
Add turmeric, green chilli, red chilli sauce.Cook 30sec then add beans and mix well.
Add chaat masala, tomatoes and adjust salt as required.
Cook till beans become dry consistency. Keep aside
Take pizza base , cut into small size round shape with the help of round cutter .
Now heat butter on nonstick tava, put the pizza base round shape pieces. crisp from one side .
Now take from tawa , on crispy side, apply tomato ketchup, put 1 tbsp of beans and grated cheese on each pieces.
Then again heat butter on tava and place this open beans sandwich on it.cook for 2min till base crisp and cheese melt.
Serve and enjoy.

recipeDescription: A healthful chapatti recipe, Soya mince chatpati chapatti is prepared by filing in soaked soya granules into samosa patties and then shallow fried. Enjoy the soya mince chapatti with green chutney or aloo curry.
preparationMethod: 1) boil soya mince water and dry thoroughly. add all remaining ingredients for filling and keep aside
2) prepare stiff dough by mixing ingridents for outer covering. divide into 10 portions
3) roll out one portion on well greased surface, into an extremely thin chapti af about 15inches diameter.
4) place a samosa chapati on big chapati, spread 3 tablespoon of filling on top and fold chapati from all sides into rectangle, enveloping filling.
5) shallow fry chapati over low heat, until golden and crisp.
6) serve with salad, red chilli chutney and tamarind chutney

recipeDescription: A protein rich vegetable preparation made with combination of paneer and soya flavoured with other vegetables as well.
preparationMethod: Combine all the ingredients, mix well and knead into a soft dough.
Cover with a wet muslin cloth and keep aside.
Heat the oil in a broad pan, add the ginger and garlic and saute for 1 minute.
Add the onions and saute till they turn golden brown.
Add all the remaining vegetables and saute they turn soft.
Add the soya granules and saute for 2 minutes.
Add the sauces, mix well and cook for 1 more minute.
Remove from the flame and add the paneer and cheese and mix well.
Add the salt and mix well.
Divide the dough into small equal portions and roll them into circles of 4" diameter.
Place a portion of the stuffing at the center and bring the sides together to seal the edges.
Heat the oil in a kadhai and deep fry till they turn golden brown form all the sides.
Drain on an absorbent paper.
Serve hot.

recipeDescription: More garam masala can be added if required more spicy. Can be served as starters with drinks.
preparationMethod: In a big bowl take water and soak soyabean chunks for 15 minutes. squeeze out all the water and cut the chunks into four pieces.
Take oil in a kadai. when oil is hot, add onions and fry till brown.
Add cut tomatoes and slit green chillies.
Fry for 1 minute.
Add turmeric powder, chilli powder, garam masala powder and salt and stir.
Add 1 cup water and bring to a boil.
Add soyabean chunks and simmer for a few minutes till it absorbs the gravy.
Add coriander leaves as garnish.

recipeDescription: Spaghetti balls is a novel cutlet or patties recipe with boiled spaghetti mixed with spice powders and then made into a ball. These spaghetti balls are the deep fried till crispy brown and enjoyed as starter or snack.
preparationMethod: Melt the butter in a thick vessel
Add 5tbsps of flour and cook for 5mins
Add the milk and continue stirring until mixture becomes lump
Allow it to cool.
Add the spagetti,coriander,green chillies,celery,salt and cheese
Mix well and shape into round balls
Mix half teacup of flour and 3/4 teacup of water and make a pase
Dip the balls in the paste
Roll theballs in bread crumbs and deep fry
Serve with tomato ketchup

ingredients: bunch of spinach (palak), chopped into big pieces
recipeDescription: Spinach sev is prepared by putting a handful of the spinach puree added sev dough into the sev mould and then deep fried. These crispy crunchy green colored spinach or palak sev is flavored with salt and spice powders and taste amazing as evening snack.
preparationMethod: Steam spinach without water for 3mins.
Blend in a mixer to a smooth paste.
Mix spinach with the remaining ingredients, except oil to a smooth dough.
Knead well. add a little water if required. put a handful of the dough into sev mould and press out sev directly into the hot oil in the kadai.
Fry rill done on bothe side.
Remove from oil.
Store in an airtight container.

recipeDescription: A very convenient to prepare and serve with cocktails and other drinks as you can serve this dish without plates.
preparationMethod: Cut the paneer into rectangular pieces of 1/2" long and keep aside.
Combine the salt, red chilli powder, coriander seeds powder, garam masala and besan batter and mix well to make a thin batter.
Take a piece of paneer and roll the leaf of palak around it and put a tooth pick(wooden) through the mid of the leaf so that the pieces of paneer is fixed.
Heat the oil in a kadhai, dip all the pieces in batter and deep fry for less than half a minute.
Sprinkle chaat-masala on the top and serve hot with spicy chutney.

recipeDescription: Its a popular rajma dish.
preparationMethod: Heat the oil in a kadhai,add onions, red chilli and saute on a medium flame for 2-3 minutes.
Add the ginger-garlic paste, mix well and saute for 1 minute.
Add the tomatoes, chilli powder, mix well and cook for 2-3 minutes.
Add the rajma, salt and 1 cup water and cook on a medium flame for 4-5 minutes.
Add the garam masala, mix well and simmer for 2 minutes.
Serve hot.

recipeName: Spice Cabbage Seasoned with Tofu and Red/green Capsicum
recipeDescription: Nice crunchy stir fry preparation which is easy and quick to make.
preparationMethod: In a non-stick pan heat the oil, add cumin seeds and fry for few seconds.
Add the tofu, mix well and cook for 3 minutes,
Add the cabbage and capsicum, all the spices and salt, stir-fry for 3 minutes on the slow flame. Cabbage and capsicum should be crunchy.
Serve warm garnish with coriander.

recipeDescription: a nutritious and healthy breakfast without fat, preferably taken with any fruit juice.
preparationMethod: Clean, wash and soak the dates and red chillies speperately in water for 10 to 15 minutes.
Remove and squeeze out the excess water.
combine the dates and chillies and blend in a mixer along with salt adding enough coconut water till smooth. Keep aside.
Heat a tava and dry roast the sesame seeds till brown.
Cool and blend in a mixer to a smooth powder. Keep aside.
In the same tava, lightly toast the bread without any oil.
Spread the ground paste evenly on one side for 4 bread slices and sprinkle sesame powder on top.
Cover with bread slices and serve immediately.

recipeDescription: A delicious spicy green coloured soup!! Simply delicious!
preparationMethod: Combine the beans with tomatoes and ginger in a pressure cooked, add 2-3 cups of water, mix well and pressure cook till cooked.
Cool slightly and blend using a hand blender till smooth. Keep aside.
